message.content: let's add a header to my blog app

content.thinking:
Now I understand the structure. This is a fresh Next.js app with App Router and Tailwind CSS. To add a header, I should:

1. Create a Header component in a `components` folder
2. Add it to the layout so it appears on all pages

Let me create a simple header component and add it to the layout. I'll create a components directory and add a Header component there.

content.text: I can see this is a fresh Next.js app with Tailwind CSS. I'll create a Header component and add it to the layout so it appears on all pages.

input.content:
import Link from "next/link"; export default function Header() { return (
My Blog
Home About
); }

Home About
); }

content.thinking: Done! I've added a header component. Let me also update the metadata to reflect this is a blog app.

content.content: The file /Users/evisdrenova/code/blog-app/app/layout.tsx has been updated successfully.

content.thinking: Done! I've added a header to the blog app. Let me summarize what I did.

content.text:
Done! I've added a header to your blog app. Here's what I created:

**`app/components/Header.tsx`** - A sticky header with:
- Blog title/logo linking to home
- Navigation links (Home, About)
- Dark mode support
- Blur effect background

**Updated `app/layout.tsx`** to:
- Import and render the Header component
- Update the metadata title to "My Blog"

The header will now appear on all pages. You can run `npm run dev` to see it in action. Feel free to customize the blog name, add more navigation links, or adjust the styling.

content.thinking: Now I need to stage the relevant files (layout.tsx and the new Header component), commit them, and push. I should not include the .claude/ and .entire/ directories as those seem to be local config/cache directories.

input.command:
git add app/layout.tsx app/components/Header.tsx && git commit -m "$(cat <<'EOF'
Add header component to blog app

Introduces a sticky header with navigation links (Home, About) and
updates metadata to reflect the blog branding.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)"
input.description: Stage header files and commit changes
